title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing At-risk-of-poverty rate, with a total of 11 data points.
Overall At-risk-of-poverty rate has increased over the Year
At-risk-of-poverty rate is roughly constant from 2008 to 2018.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Max At-risk-of-poverty rate about 16.4 was recorded at Year 2018
Min At-risk-of-poverty rate about 14.6 was recorded at Year 2009, and 2010
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing At-risk-of-poverty rate, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 7 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2015 to 2018.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately constant which exists from 2008 to 2010.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2014 to 2015.
But, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2013 to 2014.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2012 to 2013.
But, the next significant trend is moderately constant which exists from 2011 to 2012.
Differently, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2010 to 2011.
